anthimata malukatta thiranaya kale dilushata kol ekak dila anonimas widihata baninna.ithin pusange katahadawal dilusha adunana nisayi, wadeta sudusu best pudgalaya tharabasu nisayi, kol kirima tharabasutama pawaranna malukatta thiranaya kala.wadeta thoragaththe pin koyin boks eka."pin" kiwwe pinata kol karanna dunna nisanan neweyi, prinsipal sarge ofis eka laga boks eka thibuna nisa.ithin hawas waruwe tharabasuta hodata kanna bonna aran dunna purupuruyi malukattayi, dinar eken passe manswa adagena koyin boks eka lagata giyalu.

emenma, rate pawathina poli anupathayanda kramakramayen aduwima nisa, naya hasuruwime piriwaya adu wemin pawathuni. 2014 aga wana wita, rajya naya pramanaya ru. bi. 7,391 k washayen wartha wu athara, ema agaya 2014 aga wana wita thibu ru. bi. 4,590 sita ru. bi. 2,801 kin wadiwimak penwiya.
